item.title: DbContext is Not Thread-Safe: Parallelizing EF Core Queries the Right Way
item.description: Learn how to safely parallelize EF Core queries to improve performance by using IDbContextFactory to create isolated contexts, avoiding the thread-safety exceptions caused by sharing a single DbContext instance. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/dbcontext-is-not-thread-safe-parallelizing-ef-core-queries-the-right-way

item.title: Vertical Slice Architecture: Where Does the Shared Logic Live?
item.description: Deciding where shared logic lives is the most critical moment in Vertical Slice Architecture adoption, as choosing incorrectly reintroduces the coupling the architecture aims to eliminate. This article proposes a three-tier approach to sharing code that balances technical infrastructure, domain concepts, and local feature logic. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/vertical-slice-architecture-where-does-the-shared-logic-live
